special.name: Shell Defense
special.description: Hardens shell, gaining +5 AC for 2 turns

special.name: Charge
special.description: Charges forward dealing 8 damage and knocking back

special.name: Split
special.description: When killed, splits into 2 smaller blobs with half HP

special.name: Acid Spray
special.description: Sprays acid dealing 5 damage over 3 turns

special.name: Vanish
special.description: Becomes invisible, next attack deals double damage

mobs.name: Cave Dweller
mobs.backstory: An ancient dweller of these tunnels, once human perhaps, now something else entirely. They have lived in the darkness for so long they've forgotten the sun. They are not hostile - they simply want to trade, share stories, and warn travelers of the dangers ahead. They speak slowly, thoughtfully, with pauses as if remembering how words work.

special.name: Trade
special.description: Can trade items and share dungeon knowledge

dialogue: These tunnels run deep... deeper than you know.
I've been down here for... how long? Time has no meaning.
Trade with me, friend. I have things you might need.

mobs.name: Stone Guardian

special.name: Earthquake
special.description: Slams ground, dealing 12 damage to all enemies

dialogue: I guard these halls. State your purpose.
You seek the depths? Prove your strength.

mobs.name: Ethereal Wisp

special.name: Illuminate
special.description: Reveals hidden paths and increases party vision

dialogue: Follow me... I know the safe paths.
The darkness whispers secrets to those who listen.
I can light your way, traveler.

special.name: Terror Scream
special.description: Screams, causing fear and reducing enemy attack by 50% for 2 turns

special.name: Void Grasp
special.description: Pulls all enemies close and deals 15 damage

special.name: Gnaw
special.description: Bites and holds, dealing 2 damage per turn for 3 turns

mobs.name: Tunnel Goblin

special.name: Sneak Attack
special.description: If not detected, deals triple damage on first hit

dialogue: You lost? Goblin know way... for price.
Me not want trouble. You go now?

special.name: Poison Bite
special.description: Bites dealing 3 damage plus 2 poison damage per turn for 3 turns

special.name: Swarm
special.description: Calls 2-4 additional mites when attacked

special.name: Sleep Dust
special.description: Spreads dust that puts enemies to sleep for 1 turn

mobs.name: Lunar Moth

special.name: Healing Light
special.description: Emits light that heals allies for 5 HP

dialogue: The moon's light reaches even these depths.
I sense purity in your heart.
Let me guide you with my light.

special.name: Energy Blast
special.description: Fires concentrated energy dealing 10 magic damage

special.name: Disease Bite
special.description: Bites with a chance to inflict disease (-1 HP per turn)

special.name: Web Trap
special.description: Shoots web that immobilizes target for 2 turns

special.name: Burrow
special.description: Burrows underground, emerging next turn to deal 12 damage
